allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete migration to self-hosted backend with all features

- Backend: Node.js/Express + SQLite with Prisma ORM
- Execution scheduler: auto-executes orders when delay expires \(runs without browser\)
- Blocked tickers: separate view with revive functionality
- Red X overlay for OFF/Deny actions
- Execution queue: auto-removes completed orders
- Broker webhook forwarding with configurable URL
- Gate scoring and quality tiers for WALL signals

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
